nodes.text: The Clone Wars: Departure is a short webcomic leading directly into the The Clone Wars episode "Bombad Jedi".

This comic features appearances by four characters originally played by Anthony Daniels & Ahmed Best interacting with each other. C-3PO and Dannl Faytonni were portrayed in the films by Daniels, and Jar Jar Binks and Achk Med-Beq were performed by Best.
